page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The block covers a rural and coastal strip of North Devon and is mostly to the A39 trunk road which runs from Taunton in Somerset to Fraddon in Cornwall.It covers the eastern part of the parish of Clovelly, the northern part of the parish of Woolfardisworthy West or,as it is known locally,Woolsery,and a north-western strip of the parish of Parkham. There is farmland,woodland,a large holiday park and the small coastal village of Bucks Mills with part of Bucks Cross and West Bucks.Itis in the holiday area of the country,overlooking Bideford Bay where tourists stay not only in the holiday park,but also at local houses which offer Bed and Breakfast.
